pr_title: Fix subscript expression optimization during subfield pushdown

timeline.message: Fix subscript expression optimization during subfield pushdown
Fix subscript expression optimization during subfield pushdown

timeline.bodyText: Do we need the same check at L501?
timeline.author: mbasmanova

replies.bodyText: I haven't been able to come with a testcase where deference + index expression results in null though
replies.author: bhhari

replies.bodyText: @bhhari I guess this is not possible. In that case, perhaps, add a verify(index != null, "") call.
replies.author: mbasmanova

timeline.bodyText: Planner tests better go to TestHiveLogicalPlanner
timeline.author: mbasmanova

timeline.bodyText: We need to use unique table names to allow tests to run concurrently. To make sure table names don't repeat, we tend to use names that match the test name. Here, it would be test_optimized_subscript_expression.
timeline.author: mbasmanova
